post:
![](http://i.imgur.com/EUf8C6o.png)

Yet another offer post from a low end host, but we are different I assure you, like a summer host we resell the amazing **OVH** network so you can benefit from 7,500Gbits of bandwidth capacity, unlike those noobs we're not going anywhere, not a Wade Wilson in sight. 

We pride ourselves on low contention ratios and keep overselling to a minimum! You'll have a fair share of disk IOPS and CPU for our cheaper plans but 8GB> is dedicated so you can shit the bed as much as you like. Got to keep that core warm. 

> **$5 add me to the collection**  
1v CPU  
1GB RAM  
5GB SSD  
[Order you must](https://c82.myvirtkick.com/machines/new?plan_id=15)

2GB RAM  
10GB SSD
